component.name: PianoCheetah
component.summary: a better way to play it

description.p: Play and practice a pop song on piano and drums. In a "pianoroll" format that's a kinda fancy.

You practice the piano parts and the background tracks sync to your tempo. Our aim is to get a song into our head and fingers.
The real notes of the song are simplifed down to one note per hand max. And your hands stay in one position.
Any midi file can become a song for you to practice and play.
More description / install docs / screenshots on the website (see Links).

description.p: table columns are sized properly. song files are listed properly. Testers needed - please help - sh@shaz.app .

Doesn't core anymore - last release had broken link :/ Testers needed - please help - sh@shaz.app . Command keys on piano work properly. Syn does glide (portamento). Syn has envelopes (including LFOs done as an envelope). New record live in hear mode.

Always EZ notes now (in play and practice). Tracks have tooltips with #notes, #controls, first 3 of each detailed. Tracks can be combined on a given playing octave now. Testers needed - please help - sh@shaz.app .

Fixed bad bug that wan't refreshing screen. Recordings are now properly saved in 3_done directory with recSave command. Cue editing is fixed. EZ mode makes a new note upon any chord change. You can hop to a random song in your midi dir now.
syn plays all sounds properly. new song2wav to render .wav for a song. it, sfz2syn, mod2song, midimp now have GUIs (in Song List dialog). improved docs on my website.

find song crash fixed. open text editor properly. txt2song crash fixed. txt2song now shows errors in a dialog. fixed note chopping across columns. songkill would fail due to old dirs. limited song filename width to prevent horiz scrolling.
